Control Name: 3.6.1 You know the growth rate of your data.
Control Statement: Your solution might work great in the first week or month, but what happens when data just keeps increasing? Will the solution slow down, or will it even break at a particular threshold? Planning for data growth, data retention, and archiving is essential in capacity planning. Without adequately planning capacity for your datastores, performance will be negatively affected.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.6 How are you managing your data to handle scale?
